00031 void LookupTable::doApprox(Observation& obs, Vector& output) { 
00032     
00033 
00034     int intObs;
00035 
00036     assert(obs.getFeatures().size2() == 1 && obs.getFeatures().size1() == 1);  
00037     intObs = (int)(obs.getFeatures())(0,obs.getAgent());
00038     assert(intObs < observations);
00039 
00040     output = column(params, intObs);
00041 
00042 }

00045 void LookupTable::feedbackGrad(Observation& obs, Vector& deltas) {

00114 void LookupTable::scatter(Vector& v, Approximator::StatsEnum s) {
00115     
00116     assert(v.size()==(size_t)(params.size1()*params.size2()));
00117         
00118     switch (s) {
00119         case PARAMS:
00120             params.clear();
00121             UBlasExtras::addScaledVectorToMatrix(1.0, v, params, 0);
00122             break;
00123         case TRACES:
00124             params.clear();
00125             UBlasExtras::addScaledVectorToMatrix(1.0, v, trace, 0);
00126             break;
00127         default:
00128             throw runtime_error("unknown StatsEnum LookupTable::scatter\n");
00129     }
00130 
00131 }
00132 
00133 
00134 void LookupTable::reduce(Vector& v, Approximator::StatsEnum s) {
00135 
00136     assert(v.size() >= (size_t)params.size1()*params.size2());
00137 
00138     switch (s) {
00139         case PARAMS:
00140             UBlasExtras::addMatrixToVector(params, v, 0);
00141             break;
00142         case TRACES:
00143             UBlasExtras::addMatrixToVector(trace, v, 0);
00144             break;
00145         default:
00146             throw runtime_error("unknown StatsEnum LookupTable::scatter\n");
00147     }
00148 
00149 
00150 }
